recommendations.title: Improve Motion Accessibility Compliance
recommendations.description: Only 0% of files are compliant. Target: 95%+
recommendations.action: Add motion-reduce classes to all components with animations
recommendations.medicalImpact: Essential for healthcare workers with vestibular disorders

recommendations.title: Fix Emergency Component Motion Accessibility
recommendations.description: 23 emergency components lack proper motion override
recommendations.action: Implement motion-reduce:animate-pulse for critical patient safety alerts
recommendations.medicalImpact: PATIENT SAFETY - critical alerts must be visible to all users

recommendations.title: Address Motion Safety Violations
recommendations.action: Add prefers-reduced-motion support to all animated components
recommendations.medicalImpact: Legal compliance requirement for healthcare accessibility
